Title: PolarSSL: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in PolarSSL, the worst of
    which may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

Background.Text: PolarSSL is a cryptographic library for embedded systems.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in PolarSSL. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker might be able to execute arbitrary code, cause Denial of Service condition or obtain sensitive information.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text:
Gentoo has discontinued support for PolarSSL and recommends that users
      unmerge the package:
